sections.title: Welcome to Java Programming
sections.content: Java is a powerful, object-oriented programming language that's widely used in robotics, web development, mobile apps, and enterprise software. This course will take you from complete beginner to confident Java programmer.

sections.title: Why Learn Java?
sections.content:
• Robotics: Java is used in FTC (FIRST Tech Challenge) and many other robotics platforms
  • Portability: Write once, run anywhere - Java works on any device with a JVM
  • Object-Oriented: Learn modern programming concepts that apply to many languages
  • Career Opportunities: Java developers are in high demand
  • Large Community: Extensive libraries and resources available

sections.title: Course Structure
sections.content:
This course is organized into four main sections:

Java Basics: Learn fundamental concepts like variables, data types, and basic operations
Programming Logic: Master control structures and decision-making
Loops: Understand iteration and repetition in programs
Object-Oriented Programming: Learn classes, objects, and modern programming techniques

sections.title: Getting Started
sections.content:
To get the most out of this course:

  • Complete lessons in order - each builds on previous concepts
  • Practice with the code examples provided
  • Try modifying examples to see how changes affect the output
  • Don't rush - take time to understand each concept before moving on
